value.title: Tech Firms Train Voice Assistants to Understand Atypical Speech
value.excerpt: Voice assistants like Alexa and Siri often can’t understand people with dysarthria or a stutter. Their creators say that may change.

value.title: The Healthcare Revolution At Home
value.excerpt: Using new health technology provided by startups, hospitals and doctors are offering an increasing number of services in the homes of patients. The Covid-19 pandemic has accelerated this approach, which evidence shows can result in better patient outcomes and lower costs.

value.title: Way of using machine learning to aid mental health diagnoses developed

value.title: Machine learning aids in simulating dynamics of interacting atoms
value.excerpt: A revolutionary machine-learning (ML) approach to simulate the motions of atoms in materials such as aluminum is described in this week's Nature Communications journal. This automated approach to "interatomic potential development" could transform the field of computational materials discovery.
